law.text: When requested by the racing commission, the Attorney General of Kentucky, or an assistant Attorney General as he or she may designate, shall, without additional compensation, advise the racing commission and represent it in all legal proceedings.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 449, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 6, effective July 13, 2004. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 5, effective June 16, 1960.
